document_data.mainbody:
rren was a male human butler of Lord Temar on the Sword Coast North in the 1370s DR.
Arren was Lord Temars butler, who assisted him.
If the Kalach-Cha and companions accepted Sir Nevalles quest, they needed to visit Lord Temar. Arren would lead them to Lord Temar, then come to Temars assistance to attack the Kalach-Cha soon after.
